new_contact.title: New Contact
new_contact.description: {{contactName}} has been added to your contacts.

customer_export_success.title: Customers exported successfully
customer_export_success.description: Use the link to access the file, view details

no_customer_to_export.title: No Customers to Export
no_customer_to_export.description: There are no customers available for export.

whatsapp_template_error.title: WhatsApp Template Status Update Error
whatsapp_template_error.description: Failed to update template "{{templateName}}" status to {{status}}. Please check the template configuration.

template_deletion_in_progress.title: Template Deletion in Progress
template_deletion_in_progress.description: Template "{{templateName}}" is being deleted. Please wait {{retryAfter}} before creating a new template with the same name, or use a different template name.

bulk_template_delete_completed.title: Bulk Template Deletion Completed
bulk_template_delete_completed.description: Bulk deletion of {{totalTemplates}} templates has been completed. {{successfulCount}} templates were successfully deleted, {{failedCount}} failed.

bulk_template_delete_failed.title: Bulk Template Deletion Failed
bulk_template_delete_failed.description: Bulk deletion of {{totalTemplates}} templates has failed. {{failedCount}} templates failed to delete. Please check the templates and try again.

bulk_list_delete_completed.title: Bulk List Deletion Completed
bulk_list_delete_completed.description: Successfully deleted {{totalLists}} lists. All associated customers have been updated.

bulk_list_delete_failed.title: Bulk List Deletion Failed
bulk_list_delete_failed.description: Failed to delete {{failedCount}} out of {{totalLists}} lists. Please check the list configuration and try again.

bulk_list_subscribe_completed.title: Bulk List Subscribe Completed
bulk_list_subscribe_completed.description: Successfully subscribed {{customersUpdated}} customers from {{totalLists}} lists to all marketing channels (WhatsApp, SMS, Email).

bulk_list_unsubscribe_completed.title: Bulk List Unsubscribe Completed
bulk_list_unsubscribe_completed.description: Successfully unsubscribed {{customersUpdated}} customers from {{totalLists}} lists from all marketing channels (WhatsApp, SMS, Email).

bulk_segment_delete_completed.title: Bulk Segment Deletion Completed
bulk_segment_delete_completed.description: Successfully deleted {{totalSegments}} segments. All associated customers have been updated.

bulk_segment_delete_failed.title: Bulk Segment Deletion Failed
bulk_segment_delete_failed.description: Failed to delete {{failedCount}} out of {{totalSegments}} segments. Please check the segment configuration and try again.

bulk_segment_subscribe_completed.title: Bulk Segment Subscribe Completed
bulk_segment_subscribe_completed.description: Successfully subscribed {{customersUpdated}} customers from {{totalSegments}} segments to all marketing channels (WhatsApp, SMS, Email).

bulk_segment_unsubscribe_completed.title: Bulk Segment Unsubscribe Completed
bulk_segment_unsubscribe_completed.description: Successfully unsubscribed {{customersUpdated}} customers from {{totalSegments}} segments from all marketing channels (WhatsApp, SMS, Email).

customer_import_completed.title: Import completed
customer_import_completed.description: Successfully imported {{count}} out of {{total}}, view details

merge_list_failed.title: List Merge Failed
merge_list_failed.description: Failed to merge lists: {{error}}. Please check the list configuration and try again.

bulk_import_history_delete_completed.title: Bulk Import History Deletion Completed
bulk_import_history_delete_completed.description: Successfully deleted {{deletedCount}} out of {{totalRecords}} import history records.

bulk_export_delete_completed.title: Bulk Export Deletion Completed
bulk_export_delete_completed.description: Successfully deleted {{deletedCount}} out of {{totalRecords}} export records.

invoiceDownloadComplete.title: Invoice Download Ready
invoiceDownloadComplete.description: Your requested invoice download is ready. Click here to download.

invoiceDownloadFailed.title: Invoice Download Failed
invoiceDownloadFailed.description: Failed to generate your invoice download. Please try again. Error: {{error}}

subscription_charged_success.title: Subscription Charged Successfully
subscription_charged_success.description: Your subscription for plan {{pricingPlanId}} has been successfully charged {{currency}} {{amount}}. Subscription ID: {{subscriptionId}}.

subscription_cancelled_success.title: Subscription Cancelled
subscription_cancelled_success.description: Your subscription for plan {{pricingPlanId}} (ID: {{subscriptionId}}) has been {{status}}.

user_invitations_sent.title: User Invitations Sent
user_invitations_sent.description: Successfully sent invitations to {{count}} user(s) with role: {{role}}.

user_invitations_already_sent.title: Invitations Already Sent
user_invitations_already_sent.description: All {{count}} user(s) were already invited to the organization with role: {{role}}.

invitation_accepted.title: Invitation Accepted
invitation_accepted.description: You have successfully accepted the organization invitation.

back_in_stock_notification.title: Product Back in Stock
back_in_stock_notification.description: Good news! {{product_name}} is back in stock. {{variant_info}} available now. Shop now: {{product_link}}

add_to_list.title: Add to List
add_to_list.failed: Failed to add to the list.

remove_from_list.title: Remove from List
remove_from_list.failed: Failed to remove from the list.

add_to_segment.title: Add to Segment
add_to_segment.failed: Failed to add to the segment.

remove_from_segment.title: Remove from Segment
remove_from_segment.failed: Failed to remove from the segment.

subscribe_to_all_channels.title: Subscribe to All Channels
subscribe_to_all_channels.failed: Failed to subscribe to all channels.

setphone.title: Set Default Send Phone
setphone.failed: Failed to set default send phone.
